snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday’s selections include e-mail as one of the first social networks, and a humorous video about Google Glass that wasn’t made by...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday’s selections include e-mail as one of the first social networks, and a humorous video about Google Glass that wasn’t made by Google.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: The E-Mail Network, and Musically Mocking Glass
